snippet: The recall comes several years after the automakers changed parts on new vehicles to fix the possible loss of steering or failure of airbags, according to documents filed with the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration.
abstract: Volkswagen and Mazda are recalling about 613,000 vehicles over airbag and steering loss concerns, respectively.
lead_paragraph: The recall comes several years after the automakers changed parts on new vehicles to fix the possible loss of steering or failure of airbags, according to documents filed with the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration.

headline.main: Volkswagen and Mazda Recall Over 600,000 Vehicles
